meanings.sent1: The gym was full of hardbodies lifting weights.
meanings.sent2: She admired the hardbodies at the fitness competition.
meanings.sent3: The hardbodies in the gym made the weights look easy.
meanings.sent4: His hardbody strength was like a fortress against fatigue.
meanings.sent5: The hardbodies glistened with sweat after their workout.

meanings.definition: A person with a toned and athletic body.
meanings.sent1: The beach was crowded with hardbodies enjoying the sun.
meanings.sent2: He aspired to have a hardbody like the fitness model.
meanings.sent3: The hardbody on the magazine cover seemed too perfect to be real.
meanings.sent4: Her hardbody was a testament to her dedication to fitness.
meanings.sent5: The hardbody's muscles rippled as he ran along the track.

meanings.definition: A group of people with strong and well-defined muscles.
meanings.sent1: The team of hardbodies dominated the fitness competition.
meanings.sent2: The gym was filled with hardbodies working out together.
meanings.sent3: The hardbodies formed a formidable group at the bodybuilding event.
meanings.sent4: Their hardbodies stood out in the crowd of average gym-goers.
meanings.sent5: The hardbodies flexed their muscles in unison on stage.
